about_the_game:
This is a card-based Roguelite game that combines farming and tower defense elements. In this fictional world, you play as a farmer sent to a deserted island to grow crops. While farming, you'll also need to build defense towers to fend off small animals that try to steal your food every night. During the tower defense phase, each cycle rewards you with a new island plot to plan your route and expand your farmland. Along the way. There are many desert islands and stranded islanders in the ocean. After linking them, you can turn the desert into an oasis, rescue the islanders, and receive additional rewards.. Once the defense phase is over, you can exchange your harvested crops for points in the store, which can be used to unlock and upgrade various towers and crops.

Game Overview

At least 5-8 hours of gameplay
2 major game modes
17 unique buildings
15 different types of land plots
8 types of enemies with unique mechanics



· Every round offers a random combination of cards, land plots, and enemies, ensuring a controlled yet unpredictable battle experience.

· All defensive towers and crop cards have individual tech trees on the periphery, and allow players to adjust the draw probability of cards during battle through deck management. They are also easy to upgrade, requiring no excessive grinding.

· Each round lasts around 10~15 minutes, making the game perfect for unwinding after a long day or a hefty 3A title.



· The game periodically grants you random island modules. Once built, these extend the enemy's path while also increasing your planting and building area.

· Before confirming your build, you can rotate and move the island to alter its path and orientation, fulfilling strategic and tactical needs.

· Both difficulty and rewards scale with the complexity of your island path—higher risks yield higher returns.



· Different land plots and crops provide unique adjacency bonuses to your towers.

· These adjacency effects can stack, offering diverse layout strategies based on your combat style.
detailed_description:
Contact us


To better understand the needs of our players and to lower the barrier of communication between us, we've decided to make our development plans and progress publicly available on Discord. Our developers will also strive to be available 24/7 across various communities and in the Discord server. We welcome everyone to join and chat with us!
Discord Link:

name: Cropisle TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4460
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5 9400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: After an earthquake, you're sent to an island for rebuilding. Face nightly critter attacks, set up towers, and farm. Your mission is to seal the island or secure crops before defenses are breached. Now, grab your shovel and hammer, and enter the defensive battle!
